adrFormatAddress: 1280 Lexington Ave Suite 2 #1342, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: My company Lumber Dev had an excellent experience working with Achua Law. Brooke, our attorney, was incredibly thorough and efficient in helping us draft several contracts. She demonstrated a great attention to detail throughout the entire process and took the initiative to conduct background research to ensure that we were fully protected. Brooke's professionalism and ability truly stood out. In fact she even went to a seminar to further her expertise in the areas we needed help with! I would highly recommend her services to anyone seeking legal assistance. Her communication was reliable and prompt. Overall, it was a pleasure working with Achua Law and we would not hesitate to work with them again in the future.

originalText.text:
working with brooke has been a phenomenal experience.

as a first-time founder, this was my first time consulting legal advice, and i couldn’t have imagined a better lawyer to work with. brooke was incredibly thorough in her research and advice, and went above and beyond to make sure i felt comfortable with the different options i could proceed with. i felt clear about the different tradeoffs, and felt equipped to make decisions with her advice and support.

before reaching out to brooke, i was navigating my options alone — the legal space is complex and nuanced, and i was already spending so much time and energy attempting to find a solution that worked for me. this was taking up valuable resources and mental space that i needed to actually run my company. i’m really grateful to have found brooke, as she was able to simplify things drastically and help me find complete legal closure within a short amount of time. it’s fantastic to have a lawyer that matches your speed and values as an entrepreneur.

the pricing is transparent and affordable, and above all, i was blown away by her patience and human approach. thank you, brooke, for everything!

originalText.text: Brooke was extremely patient, thorough, and helpful throughout the entire process. She was able to provide direction for all of my questions. Achua Law is and always will be my first choice for legal advice and services.

text.text: Brooke was extremely patient, thorough, and helpful throughout the entire process. She was able to provide direction for all of my questions. Achua Law is and always will be my first choice for legal advice and services.

originalText.text: Ms. Achua provides extremely practical and transparent legal advice to the people she works with. She will dive into whatever issue is presented to find an answer. If she is unable to find an answer herself, she will find a way to put you in touch with someone who does know the answer and be in the room with you so that you always have someone on your side. She endeavors to give insightful advice that is easy to understand as an entrepreneur. After working with her and seeing the quality of her work, I have come to respect her counsel immensely.

originalText.text: Brooke is approachable and easy to work with. She is conscientious, pays attention to detail and can break down complex legal issues for clients in an understandable way. I wholeheartedly recommend her!
